intro: Astrotrichilia asterotricha, commonly known as the star-haired asterotricha, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant features small, yellow flowers arranged in dense clusters, with hairy stems and leaves that are often covered in fine, star-shaped trichomes. It thrives in arid or semi-arid environments and is adapted to withstand drought conditions. Astrotrichilia asterotricha is typically found in rocky soils and is often used in local horticulture for its ornamental value.
